resources.string:
My name is Amitai Efrati. 
I am 39 years old
Born and raise in Kibbutz Ruhama which is in the southern part of Israel. 
I have a wife and a 2 years old child. 
Studded Computer Science in Ben Gurion university of the Negev for almost 4 years. 
Then I started to work in the Mobile area and specifically in the Android world. 
I worked for NGSoft which create Apps for other companies. I did it for almost 2.5 years. 
Then I moved to Citi Bank innovation center and worked on the new Trading App. I did it for almost 2.5 years. 
Then I moved to 3M electronic monitoring to work on 2 new Apps for the new Mobile department. Did it for 1 year. 
Then I moved to Kin which is a subsidiary of Kik to work on an SDK on the Blockchain worlds. I worked there for 1.5 years but then the company got closedThen I moved to my last company which was called TG-17 and currently it is called Bond. 
Because of the Corona Virus I got fired with almost 50 percent of the company employees.
Currently I am searching for my next challenge.
